blockquote.p: For set and multiset the value type is the same as the key type. For map and multimap it is equal to pair<const Key, T>.

discussion.p: Strictly speaking, this is not correct because for set and multiset the value type is the same as the constant key type.

rationale.p: Not a defect. The Standard is correct as written; it uses a different mechanism (const &) for set and multiset. See issue for a related issue.
